title: Strengthening Business Language Competencies Using Adaptive Learning Technologies (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business communication skills and managerial work experience
context.additional_context: For managers/leaders, requires strengthening language competencies immediately applicable in work environments. Operated with asynchronous learning and formative assessment as the core in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize essential business-situation language expressions with over 80% accuracy using an LMS-based adaptive learning system.
Learners can analyze individual language weaknesses via computer-adaptive assessments and design personalized learning paths.
Learners achieve the target language proficiency level (CEFR B1 or higher) by completing over 90% of content provided via a mastery path approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
